items.title: Computerized Numerical Controllers(CNCs)：Movie is updated.
items.description: We have added "Vibration Cutting Control for Lathes" and "Vibration Cutting Control for Machining Centers" to the Video of M800V/M80V series feature introduction in Japanese and English.

items.title: Computerized Numerical Controllers(CNCs)：Future of Mitsubishi Electric CNC is added.
items.description: "We want to continue to be the best partner for our customers in any era."Here is a brand statement that expresses what we should be to realize that desire.

items.title: Computerized Numerical Controllers(CNCs)：HK Series is added.
items.description:
Medium-inertia, high-accuracy and high-speed motors
The latest servo motor series with improved motor efficiency due to high power density design. Battery-free encoder helps reduce maintenance costs.
